member.name: ID3D12VideoDecodeCommandList1.DecodeFrame1
member.summary: Records a decode frame operation to the command list. Inputs, outputs, and parameters for the decode are specified as arguments to this method. Takes a structure to support video decode histograms.
member.param: A pointer to an interface representing a decoder instance.
A structure specifying the output surface and output arguments.
A structure specifying the input bitstream, reference frames, and other input parameters.

member.name: ID3D12VideoDecodeCommandList1
member.summary: Encapsulates a list of graphics commands for video decoding. This interface inherits from and adds support for video decode histograms.
